body: - Add new parameter. --fail-if-missing-license (#130, thanks to @watanavex )
title: 2.14.0: Add new parameter. --fail-if-missing-license

body: - Support Mintfile ðŸŒ±(#133, thanks to @funzin )
title: 2.15.1: Support Mintfile ðŸŒ±

body:
- Change name of SwiftPackage to `package` from url last path
  - Fixed #136
title: 2.16.0: Change name of SwiftPackage to `package` from url last path

body: - Fix version number (#126, thanks to @sohichiro )
title: 2.11.4: Fix version number

body: - Collect Package.resolved located under xcworkspace (#127, thanks to @griffin-stewie )
title: 2.12.0: Collect Package.resolved located under xcworkspace

body: - Add support for SSH GitHub url for Swift Package Manager (#128, thanks to @wrutkowski )
title: 2.13.0: Add support for SSH GitHub url for Swift Package Manager

body:
- Drop Xcode 10 support
- Use the official swift-argument-parser( #141, #142 thanks to @Cyberbeni )
title: 3.0.3: Drop Xcode 10 support

body: - Split licences into multiple sections to avoid rendering issues(#138, #144 thanks @Cyberbeni )
title: 3.0.5: Split licences into multiple sections to avoid rendering issues

body: - Fix a bug where SwiftPM license files were not generated correctly. (#140, #150 thanks @yosshi4486 )
title: 3.0.7: Fix a bug where SwiftPM license files were not generated correctly

body: - Dependency update and migration to Swift.Result (#153, thanks to @gmoraleda)
title: 3.11.0: Dependency update and migration to Swift.Result

body: - Add `swift-package-path` as a custom long name to the optional argument `packagePath` ( #156, @treastrain )
title: 3.12.0: Add `swift-package-path` as a custom long name to the optional argument `packagePath`

body: - Support for multiple Package.swift (#157, thanks to @treastrain )
title: 3.13.0: Support for multiple Package.swift

body: - Support Universal Binary distribution(#148, #160, thanks to @hugehoge )
title: 3.14.2: Support Universal Binary distribution

body: - Update swift-argument-parser to latest version (#161, #162, thanks to @tarunon )
title: 3.14.4: Update swift-argument-parser to latest version
